title: BJP MLA Rameshwar Sharma's slip of tongue, said "Kashmir se Kanyakumari tak Pakistan ka naam-o-nishaan ho"
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim:
In a slip of tongue, BJP MLA from Madhya Pradesh Rameshwar Sharma while attending a function in Sant Hirdaram Nagar in Bhopal on the occassion of Shivratri ended up speaking in favour of Pakistan. He said, “Ek din aisa ho ki Kashmir se leke Kanyakumari tak, Atak se leke Katak tak Pakistan ka namo-o-nishaan ho” (From Kashmir to Kanyakumari, from Atak to Cuttack, may Pakistan’s name be known all over).

Coincidentally, it was the same MLA who just a week ago made some disgusting remarks vis-a-vis farmers who have committed suicide in the recent past. He claimed that those farmers who committed suicide were in reality subsidy lickers.
